purpose: To provide a terminal-based environment for developing, testing, and instructing AI agents
principle: Leverages terminal user interfaces (TUI) and integrates with AI frameworks like LangChain to facilitate agent orchestration and management
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with support for plugins and extensions, allowing integration with various AI models and services
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential instability; primarily designed for terminal environments
name: Instrukt
description: Integrated AI environment in the terminal. Build, test and instruct agents.
highlight: Integrated AI environment directly in the terminal for building, testing, and instructing agents
